Summary._: Northbound [A] trains are running express from 59 St to 145 St because of switch problems at 125 St.

LongDescription:
Northbound [A] trains are running express from 59 St-Columbus CircleÂ to 145 St because of switch problems at 125 St.

For service to/from 81 St-Museum of Natural History, 96 St, 103 St, 116 St and 135 St, passengers can take a downtown [A] train to 59 St-Columbus Circle for an uptown [A] train to 125 St or 145 St. OR, take nearby M10 bus stopping at nearby [A] stations.

LongDescription:
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

TRACK MAINTENANCE
Until Aug 3, Mon to Fri, from 10:45 PM to 5 AM (except 10:45 PM Mon, Jul 16 to 5 AM Tue, Jul 17)
Norwood-bound [D] trains run via the [N] from Stillwell Av to 36 St in Brooklyn


No Norwood-bound service at Bay 50 St, 25 Av, Bay Pkwy, 20, 18 Avs, 79, 71, 55, 50 Sts,
Fort Hamilton Pkwy and 9 Av.

Travel Alternatives
For service to Bay 50 St, 25 Av, Bay Pkwy, 20, 18 Avs, 79, 71, take the [D] or [N] to New Utrecht Av-62 St* and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D].

For service to 55, 50 Sts, Fort Hamilton Pkwy and 9 Av, take the [D] or [N] to 36 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D].

For service from these stations, take the [D] to New Utrecht Av-62 St or Stillwell Av and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].

*Free out-of-system transfer with MetroCard.

STATION ENHANCEMENTS | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, from 9:45 PM to 5 AM
Brooklyn-bound [F] trains run via the [E] from Roosevelt Av, Queens to 5 Av/53 St, Manhattan


Trains resume regular service at 47-50 Sts.

No Coney Island-bound [F] service at 21 St-Queensbridge, Roosevelt Island and Lexington Av/63 St.

Travel Alternatives
For service to these stations, take the [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from 21 St-Queensbridge and Roosevelt Island, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av* or, after 12:01 AM, Steinway St* and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

From Lexington Av/63 St, take the [Q] to 34 St-Herald Sq and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

*From 12:01 AM to 5 AM, [F] trains make local stop in both directions at Steinway St, Tue - Fri.

Note: 57 St is closed renovation.

For Queens Plaza, take the [E] instead.

• Transfer between [R] and [4] [6] trains at 14 St-Union Sq.
• Transfer between [R] and [E] trains at Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority or Roosevelt Av.
• Transfer between [E] and uptown [6] trains at 51 St-Lexington Av/53 St.
